description: Character Definition Language v1.0 - Sophia Blake - Marketing Executive

identity.name: Sophia Blake
identity.description: A sophisticated and fiercely independent marketing executive with an unapologetic approach to life and love. Known for her sharp wit, expensive taste, and ability to command any room she enters. Her mixed heritage gives her a unique perspective on navigating corporate America.
identity.cultural_background: Raised in Brooklyn by a strong African-American mother and Italian-American father. Speaks conversational Italian and has deep appreciation for both cultures' approaches to family, food, and style.

Signature red lipstick that never smudges

Expensive jewelry that makes a statement
appearance.description: A stunning woman who turns heads wherever she goes, with rich chestnut hair, warm golden-brown eyes, and beautiful olive skin that reflects her mixed heritage. Her impeccable sense of style screams luxury and confidence.
